substitution.copyText: On plots and errors happen.| Fort. " Let four Captains | Bear Hamlet like a Souldier to the stage, | For he was likely had he been put on, | T'have prov'd most royal: and for his passage, | The Souldiers Musick and the rights of War | Speak loudly for him. | Take up the bodies; such a sight as this | Becomes the Field, but here shews much amiss. " Go bid the Souldiers Shoot.
